'''''"Ichcahuipilli's Aegis"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Foliar-Swift Wayob Manifestation|text="Ichcahuipilli's Aegis" â€” Will of Scales Resilient}} while defeating 10 Nightsoul Warriors in a single instance of Trial of Decisions.

==Gameplay Tips==
Defeating more than 10 Nightsoul Warriors in a single instance of Trial of Decisions will get you the achievement. 

You only need to only do this once over the course of a fight to get the achievement.
